mapper.update: update article set cid=#{cid}, time=#{time}, likes=#{likes}, looked=#{looked}, title=#{title}, meta=#{meta}, content=#{content}, staticURL=#{staticURL}, type=#{type}, top=#{top}, md=#{md}, editor=#{editor}, deploy=#{deploy}, urlTitle=#{urlTitle} where artid=#{artid};
update article set time=#{time}, likes=#{likes}, looked=#{looked}, staticURL=#{staticURL} where artid=#{artid};
mapper.select: select c.cid,c.cname,art.artid,`time`,author,likes,looked,title,meta,content,staticURL,uid,`type`,top,md,editor,deploy,urlTitle from article art,category c where art.cid=c.cid and art.artid=#{artid};
select title,`time`,artid,cid,staticURL,urlTitle from article where `time`<#{time} and deploy=0 order by `time` desc limit 0,1;
select title,`time`,artid,cid,staticURL,urlTitle from article where `time`>#{time} and deploy=0 order by `time` asc limit 0,1;
select count(*) from article where deploy=0;
select * from article where deploy=0 limit #{startindex},#{pagesize};

select artid,`time`,author,title,staticURL,a.cid,top,looked,likes,c.cname,meta,urlTitle from article a,category c where a.cid=c.cid and deploy=0 order by top desc,`time` desc limit #{startindex},#{pagesize};
select count(*) from article where cid=#{cid} and deploy=0;

select artid,`time`,author,title,staticURL,a.cid,top,looked,likes,c.cname,meta,deploy,urlTitle from article a,category c where a.cid=#{cid} and a.cid=c.cid and deploy=0 order by top desc,`time` desc limit #{startindex},#{pagesize};
select count(*) from article where title like '%${key}%' and deploy=0;

select artid,`time`,author,a.cid,title,staticURL,top,looked,likes,c.cname,meta,urlTitle from article a,category c where a.cid=c.cid and title like '%${key}%' and deploy=0 order by top desc,`time` desc limit #{startindex},#{pagesize};
select title,`time`,looked,likes,meta,`type`,artid,cname,author,c.cid,staticURL,top,urlTitle from article a,category c where a.cid=c.cid and deploy=0 order by top desc,`time` desc limit 0,4;
select title,`time`,artid,cid,staticURL,urlTitle from article where deploy=0 order by `time` desc limit 0,3;
